requestcustomdomain-cloudflare-comment-a: Message commented on custom domain requests upon successful Cloudflare activation.
requestcustomdomain-cloudflare-comment-p: Message commented on custom domain requests when the incorrect permissions are found for requester.
requestcustomdomain-cloudflare-comment-e: Message commented on custom domain requests upon error.
Message commented on custom domain requests upon any error with Cloudflare other than a verification issue.
Message commented on custom domain requests when the domain verification fails.
requestcustomdomain-cloudflare-label-suc: Message displayed when an administrator successfully requeues a request for Cloudflare automation.
requestcustomdomain-comment-given: Displayed if a custom comment is given. $1 is the handler's username.
requestcustomdomain-comment-success: Message displayed when a comment is successfully added to the request.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-disallo: Message displayed when the inputted custom domain input is not allowed.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-no-host: Message displayed when no hostname has been inputted.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-not-a-u: Message displayed when the custom domain input in the Special:RequestCustomDomain form does not resemble a URL.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-protoco: Message displayed when the protocol in the inputted URL is not HTTPS.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-unneede: Message displayed when there are unnecessary components in the URL.
requestcustomdomain-duplicate-request: Message displayed when user attempts to submit a request that is to similar to an existing open request.
requestcustomdomain-edit-success: Message displayed when the request is successfully edited.
requestcustomdomainqueue-header: Legend header for request queue page
requestcustomdomain-help-target-subdomai: Help for the 'target' field when the target is a subdomain on a CreateWiki farm.
requestcustomdomain-info-groups: User groups that the requester has on the target wiki. Displayed on the 'handling' section of Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue. $1 is the requester's username; $2 is the target wiki's database name; $3 is the comma-separated list of user groups.
requestcustomdomain-info-requester-block: Message that is displayed on the 'handling' section of Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue when the requester has been blocked on the current wiki. $1 is the requester's username; $2 is the current wiki's ID.
requestcustomdomain-info-requester-locke: Message that is displayed on the 'handling' section of Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue when the requester has been locked. $1 is the requester's username.
requestcustomdomain-invalid-target: Status message displayed when invalid database name was entered for the 'target' field.
requestcustomdomain-label-add-comment: Label for the 'Add Comment' submit button.
requestcustomdomain-label-cloudflare-han: Label for the 'Handle Cloudflare' submit button.
requestcustomdomain-label-edit-request: Label for a button for editing a request for using a custom domain for your wiki.
requestcustomdomain-label-status-updated: Label for the optional comment field in the 'handling' section of Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue.
requestcustomdomain-label-target-subdoma: Label for the 'target' field when on a CreateWiki farm.
requestcustomdomain-label-update-status: Label for the handling section of Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue:
requestcustomdomain-no-changes: Message displayed if attempting to edit request without making any changes.
requestcustomdomain-notcentral:
Heading for the message displayed if there is a configured central wiki, and it is not the current wiki.
{{Identical|Disabled}}
requestcustomdomain-notcentral-text: Text for the message displayed if there is a configured central wiki, and it is not the current wiki.
requestcustomdomain-notification-body-ne: Echo notification body for 'requestcustomdomain-new-request'. $1 is reason; $2 is the requester's username; $3 is the target wiki's database name.
requestcustomdomain-notification-header-: Echo notification header for 'requestcustomdomain-request-comment'. $1 is the request ID.
Echo notification header for 'requestcustomdomain-new-request'. $1 is the request ID.
Echo notification header for 'requestcustomdomain-request-status-update'. $1 is the request ID.
requestcustomdomain-notloggedin: Error message if user tries to request a custom domain while not being logged in.
requestcustomdomain-request-edited: 'Request edited' message. $1 is the actor's username; $2 is the changes that were made.
requestcustomdomain-request-edited-reaso: Message displayed if the value of 'reason' was edited. $1 is the previous value; $2 is the new value.
requestcustomdomain-request-edited-sourc: Message displayed if the value of 'source' was edited. $1 is the previous value; $2 is the new value.
requestcustomdomain-request-edited-targe: Message displayed if the value of 'target' was edited. $1 is the previous value; $2 is the new value.
requestcustomdomain-request-locked: Message displayed above the form at Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue if the request is locked.
requestcustomdomain-request-reopened: 'Request reopened' message. $1 is the actor's username; $2 is the changes that were made.
requestcustomdomain-section-comments:
'Request Comments' section label.
{{doc-important|This means "comments about the request", not "ask for comments"}}
requestcustomdomain-section-details:
'Request Details' section label.
{{doc-important|This means "details about the request", not "ask for details"}}
requestcustomdomain-status-updated: Fixed comment given to requester when the status is updated. $1 is status.
requestcustomdomain-status-updated-succe: Message displayed when the status of the request is successfully updated.
requestcustomdomain-success: Message after a custom domain request has been successfully submitted.
requestcustomdomain-success-locked: Message displayed when a request has been successfully locked.
requestcustomdomain-success-unlocked: Message displayed when a request has been successfully unlocked.
requestcustomdomain-table-requested-date: 'Requested Date' label for the table on Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue.
requestcustomdomain-table-requester: 'Requester' label for the table on Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue.
requestcustomdomain-table-status: 'Status' label for the table on Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue.
requestcustomdomain-table-target: 'Target' label for the table on Special:RequestCustomDomainQueue.
requestcustomdomain-unknown: Message displayed if the request is not found.
requestcustomdomain-usergroups-none: Displayed value if the requester has no user groups on the target wiki.
ipb-action-request-custom-domain: The label for the action select option on [[Special:Block]] to block a user from requesting custom domains.
